text: E'i baleh'take ekati sindukera madhye rakha, tarapara etike panite bhasiye da'o, tarapara nadi take tire bherabe, take niye yabe amara eka satru o tara'o satru.â€™â€™ Ara ami tomara upare amara tarapha theke bhalabasa arpana karechilama, ara yena tumi amara cokhera samane pratipalita hate para.
